# 2. Personas & User Journeys

## 2.1 Primary Persona
*The core user we are solving the MVP for.*

| Attribute | Details |
| :--- | :--- |
| **Name** | [e.g., Alex the Analyst] |
| **Role/Job** | [e.g., Mid-level data analyst] |
| **Pain Points** | [e.g., Too many spreadsheets, slow data syncing] |
| **Needs/Motivations** | [e.g., Fast, reliable reports; simple visualization] |
| **Quote** | "I just need to see the data, not build the whole dashboard." |

---

## 2.2 Key User Journey
*The critical step-by-step path the primary persona takes to achieve a goal.*

| Step | User Action | System Reaction / Feature Needed | Notes |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **1. Trigger** | [e.g., Receives a new report request] | [System needs to provide an entry point] | Start of the process. |
| **2. Access** | [e.g., Logs into the platform] | [Authentication/Authorization] | |
| **3. Core Task** | [e.g., Selects two data sources to merge] | [Feature: Data Source Selector] | **Most valuable part of the journey.** |
| **4. Outcome** | [e.g., Shares the generated visual report] | [Feature: Export/Share function] | Success state. |
